name: Gun X Sword
description: Gain access to the <c=@abilitytype>Gunsaber</c> as an alternate weapon set, but lose the ability to swap to other weapon sets during combat. Adrenaline is replaced with <c=@abilitytype>flow</c>.

skills.name: Flow
skills.description: Flow is gained at a constant rate while in combat and decays quickly when combat ends. Attacking will not generate flow, and flow cannot be used for core warrior burst skills. Skills and traits that generate adrenaline will have their adrenaline gain converted to flow.
